description: Acme Renewable Solutions, Inc. is a mid‐sized engineering firm specializing in the design, procurement, and management of renewable energy projects. With deep expertise in solar PV and wind energy, we have successfully led multiple public‐sector pilots funded by municipal grants. Our multidisciplinary team covers environmental engineering, grant writing, and full‐stack project delivery from feasibility through operations.
